definition: act of fulfilling a desire or need or appetite
details:
noun
- act of fulfilling a desire or need or appetite
= example: act of fulfilling a desire or need or appetite
- the contentment one feels when one has fulfilled a desire, need, or expectation
= example: the contentment one feels when one has fulfilled a desire, need, or expectation
- compensation for a wrong
= example: compensation for a wrong
= synonyms: expiation
- (law) the payment of a debt or fulfillment of an obligation
= example: (law) the payment of a debt or fulfillment of an obligation
- state of being gratified or satisfied
= synonyms: gratification
